description: pfSense metrics from InfluxDB using Telegraf service

targets.query: SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cpu" fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

list.name: Disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "device" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.label: pfSense
list.name: Host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pf" WITH KEY = "host"

title: pfSense
